revision.text:
{{Doomwiki}}'''BOOM''', one of the first Doom [[source port]]s, is [[TeamTNT]]'s special version of Doom that removed many mapping limitations (the dreaded [[VPO]] and so on), fixed recurring bugs, and added extended functionality such as generalized [[LineDef]] action types and features such as new HUDs to the game. [[ZDoom]] supports nearly all of BOOM's editing features.
When Boom was discontinued, it was succeeded by [[MBF]]. From MBF derived both [[PrBoom]] and [[SMMU]]. PrBoom was followed by PrBoom+, and SMMU was followed by [[Eternity Engine]].
